page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ZIA
page.content: Every{morning}I get up at quarter past five and{wash}and{dress.}I get my hat and keys then I go to{mosque.}When I get there I take my shoes off, wash my hands, get my{Koran}and go upstairs. I sit down and open my Koran and keep{reading}it until I know it. When I know it I read it to my{mosque {man}and he gives me more to{learn.} At 8 o clock I go home to eat my {breakfast,}and go to{school.} After school I go to mosque again. At 6 o clock I have to read to the mosque man. I go home at 10 p.m. and go to sleep about 10.30 p.m.
